review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on December 9, 2022
name: SB
title: Stop the Noise!
review: We’ve used magnet boards at friends houses, offices, etc. So when we had to fly somewhere I thought these would be perfect for the plane! Then they came in…and I just have one question-why do they make so much noise?! All the others we’ve used don’t really make anything other than a slight popping sound. This…this thing is annoying and awful. We ended up not taking them on the plane bc I didn’t want to annoy everyone else every time my kid decided to change his picture.

review: My kids love this!They can’t lose anything to it so it makes it a great car ride toy. The only downfall is how loud it can be when the kids run the magnet constantly back and forth. However, I feel like it’s much better than staring at an iPad. Great toy!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
name: Lisa Loo
title: Great size, kids love it, highly recommend!
review: I have had this on my wish list for several months. I was originally going to buy the version with the ABCs on it, but ultimately decided on the plain model so my kids could write/draw anything, including letters and numbers.I'm so glad I did because they love it! It's sturdy, allows for imaginative play, and is way more engaging than just paper and pencil, crayons, or even magna-doodle type toys. The ability to design your images one dot at a time really allows for intentional creations. They will play with it for an hour at a time, practicing letters and words, playing tic-tac-toe and pictionary, and finding new ways to write and erase with different shape magnets and other items. This would make a great gift for any kid.Note: Like many people, I rely heavily on Amazon reviews before making almost any purchase, online or in brick-and-mortar stores. I am always honest with my reviews. If I love something, I shout it from the rooftops. And if I hate it, I have no problem telling you that too. If you found this review helpful, please click the button below :-)
